name: Pain Train PainPocalypse
description: Pain Train Painpocalypse is a first person shooter game set in a murky horror environment. The man known as Pain Train is an elite mercenary with the ability to drain life from his victims as he kills them. The story Pain Train continues with the subways of New York once again under siege. Time for the Pain Train, all aboard!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.4ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
